alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Champaign; Darke; Hardin; Logan; Mercer; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:35AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SHELBY, NORTHWESTERN CHAMPAIGN, LOGAN, DARKE, AUGLAIZE, HARDIN, SOUTHEASTERN MERCER AND NORTHERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 615 AM EDT... At 534 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rawson to near Union City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Piqua, Bellefontaine, Greenville, Wapakoneta, St. Marys, Kenton, Ada, Fort Shawnee, New Bremen, Minster, Versailles, Covington, Newport, Cridersville, Bradford, Union City, Anna, Fort Loramie and Jackson Center. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 80 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Auglaize; Champaign; Darke; Hardin; Logan; Mercer; Miami; Shelby
